name: mern-simplesetup
description: First time setting up the environment
author: Maks Kozak

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.client.production.js && webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.server.js && export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && react-scripts start
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production node ./dist/server.generated.js && export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && react-scripts build
